npcs.name: Echo
npcs.description: A massive forest serpent with scales that shimmer like polished stone. Her presence radiates warmth and ancient wisdom. The HT radio in your pack hums softly in her presence.

npcs.name: Alder
npcs.description: A weathered figure in patched robes, sitting cross-legged near a small fire. Their eyes hold the weight of many seasons spent in this warped forest.

npcs.name: The Naiad
npcs.description: A water spirit whose form seems to shift between mist and liquid. Her presence makes the water around her shimmer with an otherworldly light.

npcs.name: The Druid
npcs.description: A figure in earth-toned robes, their hands stained with soil and their eyes sharp with concern. They move with the careful attention of someone who knows the forest intimately.

npcs.name: The Fisher
npcs.description: A lizard-folk with scales the color of river stones, crouched by the water's edge. Their webbed hands move with practiced efficiency as they examine the creek.

npcs.name: Astrin
npcs.description: A half-dryad herbalist with leaves tangled in her hair and a satchel overflowing with plant samples. She looks frazzled but determined, her eyes bright with curiosity despite her obvious exhaustion.
